author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Blue Sky Alternative Investments Says Will Not Issue New Shares Under Purchase Plan
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Blue Sky Alternative Investments Ltd :
* ‍ANNOUNCED COMPLETION OF PLACEMENT OF ABOUT 8.7 MILLION SHARES AT ISSUE PRICE OF $11.50 PER SHARE ON MARCH 7​
* WILL NOT ACCEPT APPLICATIONS FROM SHAREHOLDERS UNDER SHARE PURCHASE PLAN​
* ‍DETERMINED NOT TO ISSUE ANY NEW SHARES IN RESPONSE TO APPLICATIONS RECEIVED UNDER SHARE PURCHASE PLAN​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
